description: Manages LinkedIn outreach campaigns and schedules engagement actions

scheduled_actions.content: Hi John, I'd love to connect and discuss potential opportunities.
Hello John, just following up on my connection request. I’d be happy to chat about how we might collaborate.

content_recommendations.connection_note: Hi John, I'd love to connect and discuss potential opportunities.
dm_sequence: Hello John, just following up on my connection request. I’d be happy to chat about how we might collaborate.
Let me know when is a good time for a quick conversation, John.

engagement_strategy.timing_recommendations: Best to send connection requests in late mornings and follow-ups in early afternoon.
engagement_strategy.follow_up_cadence: Follow-up message 3 days after the connection request.
